entries.name: Fearless
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

entries.name: Kender Ace
entries: As a bonus action, you can pull an item from your pouches. The object disappears after 1 hour.

entries.name: Taunt
entries: As a bonus action, you can unleash a barrage of insults at a creature within 60 feet, imposing disadvantage on attack rolls against others.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Kenderspeak.
